content: Transfer Student Prepare to Transfer Transferring Your Courses Meet Your Transfer Counselor DePaul Admission Partnership Program University Center Partnerships For AdvisorsIllinois Articulation InitiativeTransfer Agreements Illinois Articulation Initiative Transfer Agreements Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Types of Admission>Transfer Student>For Advisors>Transfer Agreements Transfer Agreements ​​​​Community College Partnerships creates and manages new transfer agreements and coordinates faculty-to-faculty discussion to facilitate transfer to DePaul University. If you are interested in creating an articulation agreement with DePaul, pleasecontact us. Our current Transfer Agreements include: College of DuPage Associates in Applied Science Criminal Justice to a Bachelor of Arts in Criminal Justice Program plan for Associate of Applied Science in Computing & Information Technology and Associate of Applied Science in Cybersecurity & Defense to the Bachelor of Science in Cybersecurity and Bachelor of Science in Network Engineering & Security Associate in Arts to a Bachelor of Science in Business with a Major in Accounting Associate in Arts to a Bachelor of Science in Business with a Major in Economics Associate in Arts to a Bachelor of Science in Business with a Major in Finance Associate in Arts to a Bachelor of Science in Business with a Major in Management Associate in Arts to a Bachelor of Science in Business with a Major in Marketing Associate of Arts with a Focus in Writing Studies to the Bachelor of Arts in Writing and Rhetoric Associate of Applied Science in Accountancy, Management and Marketing to the Bachelor of Arts in Professional Studies with a major in Business Administration Harper College Driehaus College of Business - Accountancy Driehaus College of Business - Economics Driehaus College of Business - Finance Driehaus College of Business - Management Driehaus College of Business - Marketing Oakton Community College Driehaus College of Business - Economics Driehaus College of Business - Marketing Driehaus College of Business - Management Driehaus College of Business - Finance Driehaus College of Business - Accountancy
